snippet.title: Neighborhorde - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
A twin stick shooter where you and up to 3 other buddies use toys defend your neighborhood from robots, ninjas, dodgeballs, ghosts, dismembered feet, aliens and zombie Abraham Lincolns (for some reason).

Also available on PS4 and Xbox One.

Neighborhorde (C) Fermenter Games
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/446760/Neighborhorde/
